title: How to Stop Bleeding Gums
steps: Identify the cause of bleeding gums.
Understand the consequences of a gum disease.
Visit your dentist.

title: How to Prevent Body Acne
steps: Talk to your doctor.
Consider the side effects of medications you are taking.
Ask about medications that may help prevent body acne.
Discuss other possible causes of your acne.

title: How to Prevent Rat Bite Fever
steps: Be aware of how you can contract rat bite fever.
Look for symptoms of streptobacillary rat bite fever.
Check for signs of spirillary rat bite fever.
Clean the bite or scratch as soon as you notice it.
Go to the hospital after you have cleaned the bite.
Take antibiotics to treat rat bite fever.

title: How to Stop a Mole from Bleeding
steps: Visit your doctor if a mole starts bleeding without provocation.
Describe the mole and related symptoms to your doctor.
Ask your doctor if they recommend surgery to test the mole.
Never attempt to remove your own mole at home.

title: How to Prevent Hives
steps: Identify hives.
Recognize the trigger for your hives.
Diagnose your hives.

title: How to Prevent a Stress Fracture
steps: Be prepared by knowing the symptoms of a stress fracture.
Be aware of the risk factors that can lead to a stress fracture.
Know how a stress fracture is diagnosed.

title: How to Stop Brain Freeze
steps: Understand what causes brain freeze.
Prevent cold food from touching the roof of your mouth.
Consume cold foods and drinks slowly.
Take a break from the cold.

title: How to Stop Wisdom Tooth Pain
steps: Learn about wisdom teeth.
Know the causes of the pain.
See your dentist.

title: How to Stop a Sneeze
steps: Know when not to stop a sneeze.
Sneeze healthily.
Sneeze politely.
Sneeze safely.

title: How to Prevent Varicose Veins
steps: Recognize the symptoms of varicose veins.
Know when to seek medical help.
Consider other treatment options.

title: How to Prevent Low Blood Sugar
steps: Understand how hypoglycemia works.
Know the symptoms of low blood sugar.
Be preventive and take precautions.
Consult your physician.

title: How to Prevent Night Sweats
steps: Discuss your symptoms with your doctor.
Identify the cause of the night sweats.
Get the necessary treatment from your doctor.

title: How to Stop a Nose Bleed
steps: Learn the types of nose bleeds.
Know the causes.
Avoid certain situations.
Visit the doctor.

title: How to Prevent Elder Abuse
steps: Recognize the risk factors.
Discover who can commit elder abuse.

title: How to Set Up a Stop‐loss Order
steps: Consider the benefits of stop-loss orders.
